body_html:
I've the same problem after successfull build from source with raspbian.
The used build command is ~/pi/pytorch/scripts/build_raspbian.sh
PYTHONPATH is /home/pi/ros_catkin_ws/devel/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:/opt/ros/kinetic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:/home/pi/pytorch/caffe2:/home/pi/pytorch/build:/home/pi/pytorch/caffe2/python

I'm not shure if these paths (manually added) are correct.
Which is correct location of caffe2.python module and how to check if it has been built?

body:
I've the same problem after successfull build from source with raspbian.
The used build command is  ~/pi/pytorch/scripts/build_raspbian.sh
PYTHONPATH is /home/pi/ros_catkin_ws/devel/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:/opt/ros/kinetic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:/**home/pi/pytorch/caffe2**:/home/pi/pytorch/build:/home/pi/pytorch/caffe2/python

I'm not shure if these paths (manually added) are correct.
Which is correct location of caffe2.python module and how to check if it has been built?
